findings.title: Contract Stuck
findings.description: If `rollToNextOption` will not be called before the `nextOption` expiration date, then the contract will be stuck in the current state.

findings.title: oToken Balance Swap
findings.description: An offchain check needs to be performed for each created option to make sure that the whole oToken balance is finally swapped (sold). Otherwise if some oTokens are left unsold, then after the exercise some of the profits will be left stuck.

findings.title: Unreasonably High Withdrawal Fee
findings.description: The `withdrawalFee` could be set to almost 100% effectively blocking any withdrawals.

findings.title: Inconsistent Option Terms Type Validation
findings.description: The current version of the contract expects to work only with `Call` options, but lacks validation of the `optionTerms` type, which could lead to inconsistencies between what is set as the `nextOption` and what will actually be used.

findings.title: rollToNextOption Function Called Multiple Times
findings.description: The rollToNextOption function could be called multiple times for the same nextOption. Consider restricting this by clearing the nextOption variable.
